data:
Maintenance fluids: 80% total fluids are calculated as follows:
3 mL/kg/h for the first 10 kg
1.5 mL/kg/h for the second 10 kg
0.75 mL/kg/h for every kg above 20 kg
15 mg/kg, PO, q6h interval, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: oral liq
15 mg/kg, NG-tube, q6h interval, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: oral liq
15mg/kg, NJ-tube, q6h interval, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: oral liq
15 mg/kg, rectal, q6h interval, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: supp
15 mg/kg, PO, q6h interval, PRN pain-mild or fever, drug form: oral liq
15 mg/kg, NG-tube, q6h interval, PRN pain-mild or fever, drug form: oral liq
15mg/kg, NJ-tube, q6h interval,  PRN pain-mild or fever, drug form: oral liq
15 mg/kg, rectal, q6h interval, PRN pain-mild or fever, drug form: supp
0.5 mg/kg, IV, q1h interval, PRN other (see comment), drug form inj
morphine PED titratable infusion (200 mcg/mL) below 6 kg standard
titrate, IV, 0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 20 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to achieve pain score goals
morphine PED titratable infusion (400 mcg/mL) 6 to 30 kg standard
titrate, IV, 0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 20 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to maintain Multidimensional assssment of pain score (MAPS) 0
morphine PED titratable infusion (1000 mcg/mL) 30 kg and above standard
titrate, IV, 0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 20 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to achieve pain score goals
dexmedeTOMidine NEO/PED titratable  infusion (4 mcg/mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0.1 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.7 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to maintain State behavioural scale (SBS) -1 to 0 and MAPS 0
midazolam NEO titratable infusion (200 mcg /mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 120 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to maintain SBS -1 to 0
midazolam PED titratable infusion (1 mg/mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 120 mcg/kg/h maximum rate, titrate instructions: titrate to maintain SBS -1 to 0
epinephrine NEO/PED titratable infusion (25 mcg/mL) below 6 kg standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.2 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
epinephrine PED  titratable infusion (50 mcg/mL) 6 to 30 kg standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.2 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
epinephrine PED titratable infusion (100 mcg/mL) 30 kg and above standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.2 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
NORepinephrine NEO  titratable infusion (25 mcg/mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.2 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
NORepinephrine PED  titratable infusion (200 mcg/mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 0.2 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
DOPamine NEO/PED  titratable infusion (1.6 mg/mL) standard
titrate, IV,  0 mcg/kg/h minimum rate, 10 mcg/kg/h maximum rate
PLACEHOLDER Central Venous Monitoring Lines 0.9% Sodium Chloride IV with heparin 2 units/mL and infuse at 2 mL/h for weight greater than 20 kg
PLACEHOLDER Arterial Lines0.9% Sodium Chloride IV with heparin 2 units/mL and infuse at 2 mL/h for weight less than 20 kg
PLACEHOLDER Arterial Lines 0.9% Sodium Chloride IV with heparin 2 units/mL and infuse at 2 mL/h for weight greater than 20 kg
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q12h interval for 2 doses or times, T;N
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q12h interval for 2 doses or times, T;N
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q24h for 2 doses or times, T;N
Arterial Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q6h interval for 2 doses or times, T;N
Arterial Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q6h interval for 2 doses or times, T;N
Venous Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q12h interval for 2 doses or times, T;N
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q24h for 2 doses or times, T;N
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q24h for 2 doses or times, T;N
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Peripheral Line, Urgent, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Central Line, Urgent, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, PICC, Urgent, Unit Collect,  Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Arterial Line, Urgent, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Urine, Midstream, Urgent, Unit Collect,Collection: T;N,  once
Urine, Midstream, Urgent, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Trachael Aspirate, Urgent, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
STAT, Transport: Portable, Portable Reason: Requires constant monitoring/observation
